mapper.insert: insert into product values( SEQ_prodcut_NO.nextval, #{prod_no}, #{sell_no}, #{prod_cate}, #{event_cate}, #{prod_name}, #{prod_price}, #{prod_brand}, #{prod_desc}, #{prod_from}, #{prod_wash}, #{prod_qual}, #{prod_detail}, #{prod_detail_img_name}, #{prod_detail_img_savename}, sysdate )
